I have created a basic website in PHP, which can be found at https://users.atw.hu/kapszy-ttki. To login as a guest use guest@example.com and guest001 as login credentials.

education.school: Saint Francis of Assisi Roman Catcholic Primary School of Diósgyőr
education.description: I have taken extra-curricular classes in Pascal, Imagine Logo, PHP, HTML, CSS, and SQL. Furthermore I have partaken in competetions.

experience.profession: My software and contributions written during my studies and as a hobby are available at gihub.com/tudi20. Examples include a tutorial-based web application using MS-SQL, ASP.NET and Angular technologies. You can also find Pascal programs written for a primary school competition.
experience.language: I've been learning English since primary school, and I achieved fluency by watching videos on YouTube and chatting online. I've also helped with community projects on Crowdin. These include the Discord communication platform and most recently the osu! rhythm video game.
